    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/finance/v3

    Facet FormOfPayment_LoyaltyRedemption

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/finance/v3:FormOfPayment_ID
        • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/finance/v3:FormOfPayment_Summary
          • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/finance/v3:FormOfPayment_LoyaltyRedemption

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<FormOfPaymentLoyaltyRedemption costCenterID="Example String Value" guaranteeID="Example String Value" guaranteeIndicatorInd="true" objID="formOfPayment_1" paymentTransactionTypeCode="charge" redemptionQuantity="1000" remark="Example String Value" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/finance/v3">
    <Identifier organization="Acme" system="sysABC3344" url="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">guid12345</Identifier>
    <FormOfPaymentRef>formOfPayment_1</FormOfPaymentRef>
    <Privacy optInDate="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" optInStatus="OptedIn" optOutDate="2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00" shareMarketInd="Yes" shareSyncInd="No"/>
    <GuaranteeTypeCode>Air travel card</GuaranteeTypeCode>
    <PromotionCode codeContext="Example String Value" description="Example String Value">Example String Value</PromotionCode>
    <LoyaltyCertificate certificateNumber="90374638372" effectiveDate="0901" expireDate="1022" expireDateExclusiveInd="true" format="Paper" iD="loyaltyCertificate_1" iD_Context="Marriott Rewards" memberNumber="283746397988" numberOfNights="3" programName="Marriott Rewards" status="Available"/>
</FormOfPaymentLoyaltyRedemption>

      • Property Summary

        Properties 
        Name Description
        PromotionCode
        Used to provide a promotion code of the loyalty redemption and the list of vendors supporting the promotion (in CodeContext).
        Details
        Type Code
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        LoyaltyCertificate
        A certificate may be needed in order to redeem miles or points. Certificates may be used in combination with each other as part of a reservation.
        Details
        Type LoyaltyCertificate
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 9

        Name Description

        Example Value 1000
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
